list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Eighteenth push.
UPDATE: 1. __init__.py a. imported Bcrypt 2. routes.py a. added password encryption for users 3. requirements.txt a. added Bcrypt
CREATED: NONE
DELETED: NONE

task.summary: Default task
First push.
Second push (gunicorn).
Third push (.flaskenv, .gitignore, Procfile).
Fourth push

Sixteenth push.
UPDATE: 1. __init__.py a. configured secrete key 2. base.html a. footer now sticky at bottom 3. database.py a. init now uses os.getenv 4. static/styles a. added photo 5. index.html a. url_for new image 6. models.py a. if user_data now unpacks user_data into User object and assigns it to variable user 7. requirements.txt 8. routes.py a. added login route and utilized forms and validations
CREATED: 1. forms.py a. LoginForm 2. login.html a. flash messages and form 3. styles.css a. styled footer and the div inside
DELETED: 1. Procfile 2. .flaskenv

Sixteenth push.
UPDATE: 1. base.html a. added url_for 2. models.py a. assigned Team.id: int = None 3. routes.py a. login -> user_login
CREATED: 1. forms.py a. TeamForm 2. routes.py a. unauthorized function b. teams route c. team_update route d. team_delete route 3. teams.html a. Entire page with tables, add, update and delete buttons
DELETED: NONE

Seventeenth push.
